props.name: datetime
props.description: An ISO8601 time representing the time

props.name: date
props.description: Instead of passing the `datetime`, it is possible to pass a full `Date` object into the `date` prop

props.name: format
props.description: The format with which to display the time

props.name: tense
props.description: The tense to use when displaying a relative time

props.name: precision
props.description: The precision to use when displaying an elapsed time

props.name: threshold
props.description: The threshold (ISO8601 duration) to display relative dates within

props.name: prefix
props.description: The prefix to use when displaying a localised (non relative) date

props.name: second
props.description: The format with which to render seconds

props.name: minute
props.description: The format with which to render minutes

props.name: hour
props.description: The format with which to render hours

props.name: weekday
props.description: The format with which to render weekdays

props.name: day
props.description: The format with which to render days

props.name: month
props.description: The format with which to render months

props.name: year
props.description: The format with which to render years

props.name: timeZoneName
props.description: The format with which to render the time zone

props.name: noTitle
props.description: Removes the `title` attribute provided on the element by default

props.name: attributeChangedCallback
props.type: (attrName: string, oldValue: unknown, newValue: unknown) => void
